text.section: The dairy industry fund is hereby created in the State Treasury as a trust and agency account to be administered by the commission for the purposes provided in this section.

Notwithstanding the provisions of KRS 45.229, any moneys accruing to this fund in any fiscal year, including state appropriations, gifts, grants, federal funds, interest, and any other funds both public and private, shall not lapse but shall be carried forward to the next fiscal year.
Any interest earnings of the fund shall become a part of the fund and shall not lapse.
Moneys received in the fund shall be used for carrying out the provisions of KRS 260.660 to 260.665.

law.history: Created 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 67, sec. 6, effective June 25, 2009.
